name: @ui-schema/json-schema
description: JSON-Schema based UI and Form Generator for React, for any Design-System
author: Michael Becker <michael@bemit.codes>

scripts.dtsgen: tsc -d --emitDeclarationOnly --pretty && node ../../tools/merge-dirs.js build/dts/uis-json-schema/src build && rm -rf build/dts && rm -rf build/**/*.test.* build/**/*.mock.*
scripts.__release: cp package.json build/ && cp package-lock.json build/ && cp README.md build/ && npm publish build
